shortdesc.p: Maggie will be going home to Northern Virginia this Spring Break. It is her last Spring Break as an undergraduate and she wants to spend it at home.
Here we will learn about where the spring break trip will take us
Here we will learn about the sleeping arrangments during the stay at NOVA
Blacksburg and Chantily are very far away. The four hour travel will be long and tiring. Maggie wants to get there in the most efficient way possible

The break is just a week but Maggie wants to do a lot while she is at NOVA. She may go to her beach house with her family, she will probably work on some homework, go swimming, eat home-cooked food and play with her dog.
Spring break isn't always cheap. It costs money to relax and have a good time, that's why it's important to consdier funding and spending
